original_text: Other clever women used goats' hair to make cloth. They did that because they wanted to help. Other clever women used goats' hair to make cloth. They did that because they wanted to help. Other clever women used goats' hair to make cloth. They did that because they wanted to help.
korean_text: 마음에 감동을 받아 슬기로운 모든 여인은 염소 털로 실을 뽑았으며

sentences.original_text: Other clever women used goats' hair
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 현명한 여성들은 염소 털을 사용했습니다

sentences.original_text: They did that because they wanted to help
